channel.title: Altirra update feed (test channel)
channel.description: Automatic update notifications for test versions of the Altirra emulator, used by the Check for Updates feature in the program.

ul.li: Cassette: Added support for paired .data.cas+.audio.ogg files for more compact tape storage.
Debugger: Added keyboard shortcuts to memory window.
Printer: ATASCII special characters are now converted to Unicode equivalents.
Tape Editor: Added Select All (Ctrl+A) and Deselect (Ctrl+Shift+A).
VFS: Improved handling of Unicode filenames within .zip archives.
